SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER ON(BRD_WRITER = MEM_NO) WHERE BRD_CATEGORY = 1 AND BRD_STATUS = 'Y' AND MEM_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE BRD_CATEGORY = 1 AND BRD_STATUS = 'Y' AND BRD_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%'

SELECT RNUM, BRD_NO, BRD_CATEGORY, BRD_TITLE, BRD_CONTENT, MEM_NAME, BRD_CNT, BRD_DATE, BRD_MODIFY, BRD_STATUS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT BRD_NO, BRD_CATEGORY, BRD_TITLE, BRD_CONTENT, MEM_NAME, BRD_CNT, BRD_DATE, BRD_MODIFY, BRD_STATUS FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER ON (BRD_WRITER = MEM_NO) WHERE BRD_CATEGORY = 1 AND BRD_STATUS = 'Y' AND MEM_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ORDER BY BRD_NO DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

AND ?

AND ?
UPDATE BOARD SET BRD_CNT = BRD_CNT + 1 WHERE BRD_NO = ?

SELECT BRD_NO, BRD_CATEGORY, BRD_TITLE, BRD_CONTENT, MEM_NAME, BRD_WRITER, BRD_CNT, BRD_DATE, BRD_MODIFY, BRD_STATUS FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER ON (BRD_WRITER = MEM_NO) WHERE BRD_STATUS = 'Y' AND BRD_NO = ?
UPDATE BOARD SET BRD_TITLE = ?, BRD_CONTENT = ?, BRD_MODIFY = SYSDATE WHERE BRD_NO = ?
UPDATE BOARD SET BRD_STATUS = 'N' WHERE BRD_NO = ?
INSERT INTO BOARD ( BRD_NO, BRD_CATEGORY, BRD_TITLE, BRD_CONTENT, BRD_WRITER, BRD_CNT, BRD_DATE, BRD_MODIFY, BRD_STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_BRD_NO.NEXTVAL, 1, ?, ?, ?, DEFAULT, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, DEFAULT )

SELECT RP_NO, RP_CONTENT, MEM_NAME, RP_WRITER, RP_DATE, RP_MODIFY, RP_STATUS, RP_PRIVACY, BRD_NO FROM REPLY JOIN MEMBER ON (MEM_NO = RP_WRITER) WHERE RP_STATUS = 'Y' AND BRD_NO = ? ORDER BY RP_NO DESC
INSERT INTO REPLY ( RP_NO, RP_CONTENT, RP_WRITER, RP_DATE, RP_MODIFY, RP_STATUS, BRD_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_RP_NO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, DEFAULT, ? )
UPDATE REPLY SET RP_STATUS = 'N' WHERE RP_NO = ?
